prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Reed, Drums, Guitar, Brass, Bass, Synth Pad, but without Piano.
captions:
Style 1:

This composition features Reed, Drums, Guitar, Brass, Bass, and Synth Pad, but Piano is absent.

Style 2:

Style 3:
